channel.title: Hugo on Vubon Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Vubon Notes

item.title: How to Deploy Your Hugo Blog to GitHub Pages
item.description:
If you want to publish a blog without paying for hosting? GitHub Pages is your friend. In this article, I will show you how to deploy a Hugo static site to GitHub Pages. Trust me, once you get it right, it’s super smooth.

Why Hugo + GitHub Pages? #

I was looking for a simple way to publish my blog. I don’t like to deal with WordPress hosting fees, database backups, or security updates. Hugo generates static HTML filesâ€”fast, secure, and free to host on GitHub Pages. What’s not to love?
